articles.title: NATO says it scrambled jets, shot down Russian drones over Poland
articles.description: Poland's military reported that it shot down Russian drones that violated its airspace, an act they termed "unprecedented." This event led Poland to request consultations with its NATO allies under Article 4 of the treaty.

articles.title: Israeli strike in Qatar targets Hamas leaders as they weigh Gaza ceasefire proposal
articles.description: An Israeli airstrike in Doha, Qatar, targeted senior Hamas leaders who were considering a ceasefire proposal for the conflict in Gaza. The attack has raised concerns about the future of mediation efforts.

articles.title: 'Block Everything' Protest Rocks France, 200 Arrested, Vehicles Set On Fire
articles.description: Widespread protests, dubbed "Block Everything," have erupted across France, leading to clashes with police, nearly 200 arrests, and the setting of fires in Paris. The demonstrations are in response to President Emmanuel Macron's government.
